name: Super Heavy Boots
description:
Imagine delving into a dungeon hoping to find treasure, but instead you find some fancy boots. Now imagine wearing those boots and discovering that they're a) so heavy you can't move and b) actually, you can move but only by teleporting. And also c) you've been engulfed by some kind of radioactive magic that obliterates any living thing you touch.

This is SUPER HEAVY BOOTS. 

Left Mouse Button to teleport. 

That's the only button you need to play, although technically you can press ESC at any time to quit the game.

It all works, but I didn't have time to check that the win condition triggers properly, or that the death/restart state triggers properly for every possible death situation. 

IN ANY CASE, have fun!

--------- 

Made for the GMT 2019 Game Jam, with the theme 'Only One'.  One button to actually play, and there's also only one level!
